title: Unspecified error occurred
body: I get this error unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information,for some time now, and I cannot seem to find a fix ! So i need some help :/

replies.body:
If you are consistently getting this error when you are trying to Patch either at 33% or after, then it usually indicates some type of connection issue.  The patcher needs to connect to our Patcher Servers, and if it isn't able to for whatever reason, it will pop this error since it has no idea why it can't.  To resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664), which should get you past this error and into the client.

Give me a heads up if you are still experiencing these issues!
Sorry for the late response ! So I tried everything,but it's till  not working ! I couldn't actually get a higher percentage than usual,but I still get the error !

Since there was some progress, but still not getting you fully patched up, the next best step is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Doing so will allow us to investigate further and provide some further specific troubleshooting steps.  Make sure to include the following logs in your tickets as well!

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
